## Type type

A type-validator/-parser that validates or parses `ResultType`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Type<ResultType> = TypeImpl<BaseTypeImpl<ResultType>>;
```

<b>References:</b> [TypeImpl](./types.typeimpl.md)<!-- -->, [BaseTypeImpl](./types.basetypeimpl.md)

## Remarks

This is the most generic interface that describes a type. It does not provide access to type-specific utilities / properties. Use [TypeImpl](./types.typeimpl.md) for an interface that describes the actual Type implementation.
